item.title: January Releases for Deskrider Tools
item.description: Here are the January releases for HttpRider and DeskRider. HttpRider MacOS Download for Mac Windows releases are still pending. Looks like I may have to switch to PyInstaller from py2app/py2exe. Hoping to finish it over the coming week. DevRider MacOS Download for Mac Windows Download for Windows
